name: Soups On! (Demo)
description:
Soups On! Is A Weird Shitpost RPG Maker Game, Based Of The Lack Of Talent Comic (Lack Of Talent: Comic Strips On The Daily | WEBTOON (webtoons.com)), That Is Going For The Same No Quality Guaranteed Experience

The Full Release Will Be For 0.00$! (Note, The Game Will Be Released As A Separate Product/Page Then The Demo)
